item.description:
Tom Caldwell and I are hiking the Carters on Wednesday. We will decide the actual route Wed morning based on the latest trail conditon reports, but we plan on hitting all three peaks (Middle, South, Carter Dome).

This is an advanced hike where we expect to be breaking trail through deep snow and finishing after dark. This will be a strenuous 15 mile hike with short stops at a book time pace.

We will meet at @ 7:45 AM and be on trail at 8 AM sharp.

Anybody considering joining us should be experienced in Winter hiking for long distances, be comfortable hiking at night, breaking trail in deep snow, bushwhacking around blowdowns, and be knowledgable in the proper Winter grea required for such an endeavor.

Please feel free to ask questions prior to the hike.
item.name: The Carters! (ADVANCED)
